/hr/ghcr.io-home-operations-charts-mirro.title: loki helm release
/hr/ghcr.io-home-operations-charts-mirro.name: loki
/hr/ghcr.io-home-operations-charts-mirro.doc: Loki is a log aggregation system that aggregates logs from various sources, such as Kubernetes, and makes them available for search and analysis. It uses a label-based approach to categorize logs, making it easy to query and retrieve relevant logs. The system is designed to be horizontally scalable, highly available, and multi-tenant, making it suitable for use in a variety of environments, including home labs.

0: A collection of all of my links and public accounts

- name: AIRFLOW__CORE__LOAD_EXAMPLES
  value: 'False'
- name: AIRFLOW__CORE__HIDE_SENSITIVE_VAR_CONN_FIELDS
  value: 'False'
- name: AIRFLOW__CORE__DEFAULT_TIMEZONE
  value: Australia/Perth
- name: AIRFLOW__WEBSERVER__BASE_URL
  value: 'https://airflow.${SECRET_DOMAIN}'
- name: AIRFLOW__WEBSERVER__DEFAULT_WRAP
  value: 'True'
- name: AIRFLOW__WEBSERVER__EXPOSE_CONFIG
  value: 'True'

- secretRef:
    name: airflow-secrets
- configMapRef:
    name: airflow-user-config
SELECT TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND,ts,UTC_TIMESTAMP()) as drift FROM sys_operator.heartbeat ORDER BY drift ASC LIMIT 1
/usr/local/bin/orc-helper event -w '{failureClusterAlias}' 'OrcFailureDetection' 'Failure: {failureType}, failed host: {failedHost}, lost replcas: {lostReplicas}' || true
/usr/local/bin/orc-helper event -w '{failureClusterAlias}' 'OrcPostUnsuccessfulFailover' 'Failure: {failureType}, failed host: {failedHost} with {countSlaves} slaves' || true
/usr/local/bin/orc-helper event '{failureClusterAlias}' 'OrcPostMasterFailover' 'Failure type: {failureType}, new master: {successorHost}, slaves: {slaveHosts}' || true
/usr/local/bin/orc-helper event '{failureClusterAlias}' 'OrcPostIntermediateMasterFailover' 'Failure type: {failureType}, failed hosts: {failedHost}, slaves: {countSlaves}' || true

# From: https://mrkaran.dev/posts/isp-monitoring/

[[inputs.ping]]
  urls = ["1.1.1.1", "google.com", "reddit.com", "twitter.com", "amazon.ca"]
  count = 4
  ping_interval = 1.0
  timeout = 2.0

# DNS plugin
[[inputs.dns_query]]
  servers = ["${BLOCKY_IP}"]
  domains = ["cloudflare.com", "google.com", "reddit.com", "twitter.com", "amazon.ca"]

# Output format plugins
[[outputs.prometheus_client]]
  listen = ":9283"
  metric_version = 2
